title: 2  Understanding file systems
text:
A file is a unit of storage on a computer with a name. The sort of information held in a file determines its file type. One of the simplest types of file is a “plain text file”
files of file plain text, markup and markdown
file extensions
the relationship between file extensions and programs
A file system contains files and folders
files systems are hierarchical



A file hierarchy containing 4 levels of folders and files


folder is a directory getwd(), dir() in R, cd, pwd in unix, os.getcwd() in Python
using a file explorer, showing file extensions
Paths
Working directory
Relative and absolute paths
